name: Caligo's Expansion
description:
Incarnate the Physaridae Caligo and reach levels to eat everything

Caligo's Expansion is a school project created by 5 students.

It's possible that you encounter few bugs :/

(if you can't move or anything just hit the "Pause" button and get back in the game)

Feel free to give us feedbacks ;)

Developer : The greatest Bastien Bodineau

Art Direction, Sound Designer and Animator : The majestic Marceau Blaskevic (https://www.instagram.com/michclix/?hl=fr)

Concept Artist, GUI Artist : The admirable Claire Pralas

Game and Level designers : The phenomenom Matteo Toller-Bologna and The  Astonishing Mattéo Sarazin (https://matteoysarazin.wixsite.com/matteosarazin)
